text: Kathy Ann Najimy (born February 6, 1957) is an American movie, television, stage, and voice actress who is known for her voice role as Peggy Hill in King of the Hill. Najimy was born on February 6, 1957 in San Diego, California.Kathy Najimy Biography (1957-) She studied at Como Elementary School. She has been married to Dan Finnerty since 1995. They have a daughter. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Writers from San Diego Category:Comedians from San Diego Category:American LGBT rights activists
title: Kathy Najimy
